sponsor: The University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston
briefTitle: Evaluating the Efficacy of Dextromethorphan/Quinidine in Treating Irritability in Huntington's Disease
officialTitle: Evaluating the Efficacy of Dextromethorphan/Quinidine in Treating Irritability in Huntington's Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess efficacy and safety of dextromethorphan/quinidine 20mg/10mg (DM/Q 20mg/10mg) in patients with irritability due to Huntington's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Irritability as Assessed by The Irritability Scale.
